reviewText: I enjoyed every movie in this set. The Fugitive, Presumed innocent, and Firewall I have seen several times. Harrison Ford brings a intensity to the role he plays in each movie of this set.  Mosquito Coast is  not the equal of the other three films, but the character Ford plays in this movie is perhaps the most complex. It is not difficult to identify with this man who loves his family and wants disparately to protect them from what he perceives as the decay of American society.  There is nothing he will not sacrifice for them. This four movie set is well worth the price, and definitely worth adding to your collection.
and they each are nicely labeled. I already owned most of these on VHS but thought this was a good deal.... and it was

What's not to like here? One of the greatest actors of all time (in my opinion) Fugitive is one of his most famous roles, and the other 3 movies are great also! Great buy for the price, all 4 movies came on 4 separate discs! Which was even better!!!

Convenient to have these together. When I opened the case and saw them I was worried about scratches. But they have played fine.

I bought this to expand our movie collection, and just becaue I like this actor's movies in general. I had not seen Mosquito Coast before, in large part because the title didn't much appeal to me, but I watched it once I got this collection. All I can say is, wow. It's a movie that intrigues you and also puts you on edge and keeps you there through the whole picture. The Fugitive was a familiar movie to me as I've seen it a couple of times before, and never get tired of it. Presumed innocent will certainly keep you on the edge of your seat, as will Firewall, another film I failed to see when it first came out. I'm glad I bought these for our collection.
4 of his best performed movies.  I try to not think about his personal life choices but applaud him on his screen talent to convey the depth of the characters he is playing.

Honestly there probably could have been several better movies to include in a Harrison Ford 4 pack, but if you enjoy these movies, or ANY movie with Mr Ford, (as is my case) go ahead and make the grab.

My husband's favorite actor is Harrison Ford so when it came to getting him something for Christmas this was a no brainer. It was in good condition when I received it and contained all four movies. Good choice if you ask me.
Finding 4 favorite dvd's all together was a bonus. Harrison Ford is such a great actor and we enjoy watching his flicks over and over again. A great item well worth the money.

The only one that I didn't absolutely love was "Mosquito Coast."  It's the story of an already unbalanced man who takes his family to the jungle to live.  He becomes more and more fanatic and out of touch as time goes on and one misadventure follows another.  The only thing you want by the end is for his wife and children to escape.  His progress is set against that of a repulsive Christian missionary's.  It's the old question of whether man should be in nature or dominant over it.  There is no answer here, of course.  It is a good movie.  I did not enjoy it.  I did enjoy the other immensely.  A real bargain.
